alert.note: Alert for Bent; Kiowa (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 2:11PM MDT until May 31 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Kiowa County in southeastern Colorado... North central Bent County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 245 PM MDT. * At 211 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Blue Lake, or 26 miles west of Lamar, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Kiowa and north central Bent Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
